property.name: Address
property.tp:docstring: The Bluetooth device address of the device.

property.name: AddressType
property.tp:docstring: The Bluetooth device address type, which is "public" or "random".

property.name: Alias
property.tp:docstring: The Bluetooth device alias of the device.

property.name: Name
property.tp:docstring: The Bluetooth friendly name of the device.

property.name: Type
property.tp:docstring: The carriers supported by this remote device.

property.name: Appearance
property.tp:docstring: The external appearance of the device

property.name: RSSI
property.tp:docstring: Received Signal Strength Indicator of the remote device.

property.name: MTU
property.tp:docstring: The Maximum Transmission Unit used in ATT communication.

property.name: UUIDs
property.tp:docstring: The list of the available remote services.

property.name: Class
property.tp:docstring: The Bluetooth class of device of the remote device.

property.name: Paired
property.tp:docstring: Indicates if the remote device is paired.

property.name: Connected
property.tp:docstring: Indicates that the device is currently connected.

property.name: Adapter
property.tp:docstring: Object path of the adapter the device belongs to.

method.name: Connect
method.tp:docstring: This is a generic method to connect any profiles the remote device supports that can be connected to.

method.name: Pair
method.tp:docstring: This method will connect to the remote device, initiate pairing and then retrieve all SDP records (or GATT primary services).
